alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 3:08PM MST until January 18 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Southwest Utah. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Periods of winter driving conditions will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...During the first portion of the storm through Tuesday afternoon, the Cedar City area and other towns on the north slopes of the Pine Valley Mountains may see less snow than towns to the north due to shadowing in southwest flow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
